Module thomasmccue.dbclientappreal
Package thomasmccue.dbclientapp.controller

Class AddOrUpdateAppointmentController

java.lang.Object
thomasmccue.dbclientapp.controller.AddOrUpdateAppointmentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddOrUpdateAppointmentController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class serves as a controller and manages the addOrModifyAppointmentPage.fxml. Depending on whether the Add or Update buttons were used to access it from the landing page, it behaves differently.

    • saveClicked

      public void saveClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method is called when the save button is clicked on the add appointment or the update appointment forms. If the controller is accessed from the Add button, the save button will say "Save". In this case user input is collected from the form. Checks are executed to ensure the form is filled out, and to ensure user input for appointment times are valid. If the checks are all passed, an Appointment object is created from the users input and sent to the AppointmentDao.addAppt() method to be added to the sql table and in the GUI for the landing page. If the checks are not passed, an appropriate error message is printed to the GUI. If the controller is accessed from the Update button, the save button will say "Save Changes". In this case user input is checked to ensure the form is filled out, and to ensure user input for appointment times are valid. If the user input passes the checks the mutators/setters for the selected appointment object are called, and update the appointment object so that the users input is set. Then the appointment is sent to AppointmentDao.updateAppt() method to be updated in the sql table and in the GUI for the landing page. If the checks are not passed, an appropriate error message is printed to the GUI.
      Parameters:
      event -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • apptTimesInBusinessHours

      public static boolean apptTimesInBusinessHours(ZonedDateTime start, ZonedDateTime end)
      This method is called by the saveClicked method. It checks that the user input for an appointment start and end time are within the business hours of 8:00am to 10:00pm et.
      Parameters:
      start - the users chosen start date/time
      end - the users chosen end date/time
      Returns:
      boolean to show whether start and end are within business hours.

    • apptTimesStartBeforeEnd

      public static boolean apptTimesStartBeforeEnd(ZonedDateTime start, ZonedDateTime end)
      This method is called by the saveClicked method. It checks that the user input for an appointment start time is before the user input for an appointment end time.
      Parameters:
      start - the users chosen start date/time
      end - the users chosen end date/time
      Returns:
      boolean to show whether start is before end

    • apptOverlaps

      public static boolean apptOverlaps(ZonedDateTime start, ZonedDateTime end, int custId, int apptId)
      This method is called by the saveClicked method. It checks that the user input for appointment start and end times do not overlap with an already scheduled appointment for the selected customer, as a customer cannot be in two places at once.
      Parameters:
      start - the users chosen start date/time
      end - the users chosen end date/time
      apptId - used to ensure that in update mode, the appointment being updated doesn't cause a false scheduling conflict
      custId - only appointments for the same customer must be checked for overlap
      Returns:
      boolean to show whether there is a scheduling conflict

    • cancelClicked

      public void cancelClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method closes the Update or Add window when the cancel button is clicked.

    • setUpAdd

      public void setUpAdd(String titleText, String buttonText) throws IOException
      This method is called from the LandingPageController if the addOrModifyAppointment.fxml GUI is to be accessed from the Add button.
      Parameters:
      titleText - sets the title of the form
      buttonText - sets the text on the save button to "Save"
      Throws:
      IOException

    • setUpModify

      public void setUpModify(String titleText, String buttonText, Appointment appointment) throws IOException
      This method is called from the LandingPageController if the addOrModifyAppointment.fxml GUI is to be accessed from the Update button.
      Parameters:
      titleText - sets the title of the form
      buttonText - sets the text on the save button to "Save Updates"
      appointment - passes the selected appointment so that it can be updated
      Throws:
      IOException
